Mozilla M15 Released

19 Apr 2000

Milestone 15 has been released from the folks over at Mozilla with lots of new features and bug fixes in this release.\n \nYou can download your favorite flavor at our browser archive or right from Mozilla.\n

\n

\nYou can view some of the fixed bugs or see how far along the project is.\n
